profile:
Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project! 

Services/Products:
Asphalt Roofing, Metal Roofing, Flat Roofing, Roofing Repairs, Eavestrough and Gutter, Siding, Roofing Products, Roofing Ventilation, Commercial Roofing, Residential Roofing

Brands
IKO, CertainTeed, Owens Corning, BP, GAF, James Hardie, Genteck, Euroshield, Wakefield Bridge, Heritage, Ameri-Cana, Junior H-F, T-Rex, Velux Skylights, Duraflow, Venmar

In business since: 2012

http://rydelroofing.com/
1800 Woodward Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 0P7
(613) 656-8606
products: Eavestrough and gutter, roofing ventilation, roofing products and roofing skylight
services: When you need siding and roofing services in Ottawa and surroundings area, you want a team that can quickly arrive onsite to complete the task. We have teams of qualified workers for both residential and commercial clients that are ready to respond quickly and effectively when you have a roofing problem that needs prompt attention. Our services includes roofing, siding, roof repairs, evastrough, snow and ice removal, soffit and fascia

profile:
Halifax’s “Godfather of Roofing” Contractor 45 Years of Roofing!

Halifax  NS, GAF Certified Installer, Fully Service Laminated Shingle Installations, Repairs and 24HR Emergency Roof Repairs 
Your roof is your home's main defense against the elements. Let us walk you through the best options to fit your needs and once you feel comfortable with your choice, we'll handle the complete installation.

We understand the peace of mind of knowing you have a strong brand and quality for years to come. That's why we offer GAF Roofing Materials!

Reliable Upgrades
If you're looking to update or upgrade your roofing and gutters, we've got you covered. Book a free consultation to discuss our six different types of roofing composition and environmentally friendly options!

Upkeep & Repair
Age and environmental factors can wreak havoc on your roof. Ignoring problems for too long can cause headaches down the road. Start with a free inspection today!
services:
Reliable Roofing Services
As specialists in residential and commercial roofing  services, we are dedicated to providing customer service that is second to none. Whether you have a new construction project or it is time for repairs, we offer the roofing services you need throughout Halifax, Dartmouth and Bedford.

Individualized Roofing Options
We provide a full consultation to explain your available options so that you can choose the roofing plan that’s right for your home or business. We will work with you and adhere to your personal needs, and then we'll be in contact through the whole project.

Satisfaction Guaranteed
We strive to save you both time and money by combining roofing knowledge, the highest quality parts and equipment, and dedication to delivering exceptional service. We will not leave the job until it is finished and you are satisfied with the results.

profile:
ROOF MEDIC LTD IS A LEADING HALIFAX-BASED ROOFING CONTRACTOR WITH A WEALTH OF EXPERIENCE IN THE ROOFING BUSINESS
We understand that your home is your most valuable asset and protecting it with a well-constructed, premium roof is what you want. Whether it’s repairs or a full replacement, Roof Medic will provide you with the best advice so that you can protect your investment.

Our hardworking team is completely committed to ensuring you receive the best roofing services and support … when you need it most.

With well over 30 years of experience, Jimmy and the Roof Medic team offer expert repair services for many different types of roofing work. If you have a leaky roof, we’ll fix it and fully guarantee our work. If a section or your roof has lifted due to wind or storm damage, we can repair it.
When it’s time to re-shingle a roof, it’s very important to consider the quality of the raw materials. A good quality shingle will last longer, save money over time, and is far more environmentally friendly.
services: Roof & Deck Repairs and Replacements, Flat Roofs and Pitch Modification, Tapered Insulation, Shingles, Leaks, Gutters & Eavestroughs, Installing Downspouts
